actionConfiguration.body:
SELECT id, invoice_number, client_name, trip_month, banner, status,
(total_price_after_vat_ait - received_amount) as total_receivable_with_vat_ait,
total_price_after_vat_ait as invoice_amount,
received_amount as received_amount_w_vat_ait,
received_amount_wo_vat_ait,
shop_id, user_data,trip_counts,hard_copy_receiving_date,vat,received_vat_amount, ait, received_ait_amount,
hard_copy_of_bill,
replace(hard_copy_of_bill, '''','')::json->0 hard_copy FROM finance_trip_invoices where status != 'Invalid'
and trip_month = '{{moment(DatePicker1.selectedDate).format("MMM-YY")}}'
